name: liascript
author: Andr√© Dietrich
description: An extended Markdown interpreter for the creation of interactive online courses.

scripts.analyze: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer src/entry/app/index.html
scripts.build:app: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url . src/entry/app/index.html && npm run sw
scripts.build:indexeddb: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url . src/entry/indexeddb/index.html
scripts.build:base: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url . src/entry/base/index.html
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url . src/entry/dev/index.html && npm run sw
scripts.build:scorm1.2: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url . src/entry/scorm1.2/index.html
scripts.build:worker: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --target node src/entry/worker/index.js
scripts.build:webcomponent: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps src/entry/webcomponent/index.ts && rm dist/README.md
scripts.build:webcomponentPublic: npm run clean && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --public-url https://liascript.github.io/webcomponent/ src/entry/webcomponent/index.ts && rm dist/README.md
scripts.minify:js: find dist -name "*.js" -print0 | xargs -0 -P 4 -I {} sh -c 'before=$(wc -c < {}); minify {} > {}.min && after=$(wc -c < {}.min); if [ ${after} -lt ${before} ]; then mv {}.min {}; reduction=$((${before}-${after})); percent=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.2f\", ${reduction}/${before}*100}"); echo "{} reduced from ${before} to ${after} bytes (${percent}% reduction)"; else rm {}.min; echo "{} no reduction achieved, file size unchanged"; fi'
